trans-unit.id: New to Rio de Janeiro? Don’t worry! Use RioGo to get to your events in time and without hassle.
trans-unit.source: New to Rio de Janeiro? Don’t worry! Use RioGo to get to your events in time and without hassle.
trans-unit.target: Neu in Rio de Janeiro? Macht nichts! Verwende RioGo, um pünktlich und ohne Hektik an Veranstaltungen teilzunehmen.
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.

alt-trans.target: Neu in Rio de Janeiro? Macht nichts! Verwende RioGo, um pünktlich und ohne Hektik an Ereignissen teilzunehmen.

trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.

trans-unit.id: Simply enter your hotel, events and other attractions you’d like to see. RioGo will create the perfect itinerary for you each day.
trans-unit.source: Simply enter your hotel, events and other attractions you’d like to see. RioGo will create the perfect itinerary for you each day.

trans-unit.id: You are about to remove the last session from the event. This will remove the event from the agenda. Do you wish to proceed?
trans-unit.source: You are about to remove the last session from the event. This will remove the event from the agenda. Do you wish to proceed?
trans-unit.target: Du bist dabei die letzte Begegnung von dieser Veranstaltung zu entfernen. Dies wird die Veranstaltung selbst von deiner Agenda entfernen. Fortfahren?
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.
